techmeme.title: Change Healthcare says the February ransomware attack on its systems resulted in the theft of medical records of a "substantial proportion of people" in the US (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)
Sources: Amazon has considered a $5 to $10 monthly price tag for a revamped Alexa with generative AI features, dubbed "Remarkable Alexa" (Greg Bensinger/Reuters)
Sources: Sony is making deep cuts to funding for VR games, with only two PSVR 2 games in development; Sony released just three PSVR 2 games last year (Nicholas Sutrich/Android Central)
The US publishes targeted draft rules to ban or require notification of US investments in AI and other key technology sectors in China (Reuters)
Apple will withhold the release of Apple Intelligence, iPhone Mirroring, and more in the EU this year, citing concerns about DMA's interoperability requirements (Bloomberg)
